name: CardBound (ZenoBunny)
description:
Life is known as a dreary one, yet you have it all what most dream of in your hands. Yet, in your eyes, all you see are castle walls– and dream of something more. Would you throw everything away, just to live a life with no walls?

CardBound is an anime-style, fantasy, turn-based game that fuses 2D artworks and 3D environments to simulate a table-top game; the game will be built using the Unity engine. It will feature essential aspects of a turn-based game by taking well known aspects from other games in its genre, such as status ailments, character stats, and strengths vs weaknesses.

The inspiration of the game is from Square Enix's, Voice of Cards.

Please note: This was a game project for Academy of Art University done by a group of students, currently there are no plan to finish this game.
